title: Jake Quickenden enjoys raucous ride home after boozy Inside Soap Awards afterparty
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Jake Quickenden had a very wild first Inside Soap Awards experience.

The Hollyoaks guest star, 31, partied hard with the greatest and the good of the showbiz world at the Inside Soap Awards afterparty at Sway nightclub, in London on Monday.

A giddy Jake pressed his face up against the glass when he clambered into his taxi home.

The I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! star looked triumphant as he waved his trophy around with pride on his exit from the nightclub.

In a hilarious sequence, the worse-for-wear reality star shared clips of his ride home with his legion of fans on Instagram.

(Image: JAMES CURLEY)

Hollyoaks had scooped the Best Soap award earlier on at the glittering awards ceremony.

The dishy actor had arrived looking sharp in a slim-fit turtleneck sweater and grey blazer for his evening with his co-stars.

It was Jake's first year at Inside Soap Awards after he landed a guest role on a soap.

(Image: JAMES CURLEY)

(Image: JAMES CURLEY)

The hunky TV star has been branching out into the soap world after making his mark on the reality television spheres.

In March, it was revealed Hollyoaks offered the hunk a guest role as the hunky builder Woody.

The Dancing on Ice star had initially been linked to Hollyoaks the year before but nothing had come to fruition at the time.

Prior to acting, he has starred on X Factor and I'm A Celebrity as well as Dancing on Ice.

The TV personality shared his excitement about starting out on Hollyoaks with a touching post on Instagram at the time.

He wrote: "This is pretty blooooming exciting, so yeah after doing a musical tour for the past six months I'm now joining the amazing @hollyoaksofficial family.

"First day yesterday and everyone was so lovely, the cast the crew the lot. Excited to test myself again at something new... Don't tell people you you can't, work hard and good things will happen."
description: Hollyoaks guest star Jake, 31, partied hard with the greatest and the good of the showbiz world at the event
